name: Zco Corporation
tag_list: zco, custom-software-development, mobile-application-development, custom-application-development, ipad-application-development, ipad-developers, ipad-development, blackberry-application-development, android-application-development, windows-mobile-applicat
overview:
Zco develops both industrial strength backend applications using .net and Java as well as apps for ALL major mobile platforms including iPad, iPhone, BlackBerry, Android, Windows Phone, Palm Pre and Symbian.

Whether developed by Zco or someone else, the company can help you promote your products and services using search engine optimization and social media optimization techniques, stunning graphics, 3D animation and video effects, press releases, YouTube, Facebook, Twitter, Myspace, Google, Yahoo and Bing.
